entry.title: aman3255/LinkShrink: A lightweight and efficient URL shortener built with Express.js and Zod for validation. This app allows users to shorten long URLs into unique, easily shareable links. It includes robust URL validation, collision-free key generation, and support for redirection. Ideal for learning and small-scale projects!
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient URL shortener built with Express.js and Zod for validation. This app allows users to shorten long URLs into unique, easily shareable links. It includes robust URL validation, collision-free key generation, and support for redirection. Ideal for learning and small-scale projects!

entry.content: Pocket is a lightweight nostr relay for local and p2p use.

entry.title: himani2011/MediaStream: Created a lightweight media streaming platform featuring a microservices architecture, indirect messaging, Kubernetes and Terraform-driven infrastructure, and a CI/CD pipeline, delivering scalable, reliable, and efficient production deployments.

entry.title: nodebysam/TestLab.js: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!
entry.content: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!

entry.title: KuldeepLakum/TicTakToy: This Tic-Tac-Toe game is a fun, interactive web-based implementation of the classic two-player strategy game. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it’s lightweight, responsive, and simple to play, making it perfect for showcasing your coding skills or having a quick match with friends.
entry.content: This Tic-Tac-Toe game is a fun, interactive web-based implementation of the classic two-player strategy game. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it’s lightweight, responsive, and simple to play, making it perfect for showcasing your coding skills or having a quick match with friends.

entry.title: austin-thesing/quick-web-animations: A lightweight animation library featuring JavaScript scroll animations powered by GSAP and a complementary CSS-only animation system. Add beautiful scroll-triggered or instant animations to any element using simple data attributes. Perfect for Webflow projects and custom websites.
entry.content: A lightweight animation library featuring JavaScript scroll animations powered by GSAP and a complementary CSS-only animation system. Add beautiful scroll-triggered or instant animations to any element using simple data attributes. Perfect for Webflow projects and custom websites.
